trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> objects for a control.
Simple data binding is accomplished by adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Associação de dados simples é feita adicionando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objetos para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Any object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer objeto que herda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> classe pode acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.
trans-unit.target: Para uma lista de janelas de controles que suportam associação de dados, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example binds the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to a field in a database.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir associa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle a um campo em um banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to add to the collection.
Adds the specified binding to the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to add to the collection.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to the collection.
The <paramref name="dataBinding" /> argument was <see langword="null" />.
Clears the collection of binding objects.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs when you invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> evento ocorre quando você chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.Clear%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any members.
Occurs when the collection has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> named `BindingsCollection1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> chamado `BindingsCollection1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection is about to change.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> named `BindingsCollection1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection> chamado `BindingsCollection1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bindings in the collection.
The total number of bindings in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número total de associações na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to find.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> value of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> in a control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingMemberInfo.BindingMember%2A> valor de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> em um controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The collection doesn't contain an item at the specified index.
Gets the bindings in the collection as an object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> containing all of the collection members.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> que contém todos os membros da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging" /> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging> event occurs when the event is about to change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging> evento ocorre quando o evento está prestes a ser alterada.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanging%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanging%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanging(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanging(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanging(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.OnCollectionChanging(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The Binding to remove from the collection.
Deletes the specified binding from the collection.
The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to remove.
Deletes the binding from the collection at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to remove.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> from the collection.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection should be serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the collection count is greater than zero; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
